name: Genetic Path Finding
description: Generates lots of agents with random moves. The ones with the best fitness are used to generate more agents to learn a path.

name: DJ Visualizer
description: , - halves the bpm
. - doubles the bpm
[ ] - shifts color theme down/up
1 - toggles random circles
2 - toggles verticle lines<
3 - toggles spiral lines
4 - toggles center circle
up/down - changes bpm +/- 5
left/right - changes bpm +/- 1
spacebar - tap for the program to learn the BPM you are tapping at

name: Maze path finder
description: Generates random maze and uses BFS to make sure there is a path possible between them then visualizes how it searches the graph until it finds a path from the start point to the end point

name: Text Display
description: I was inspired to make something cute for displaying tiktok names on live or just any text in an interesting way

name: Langton's Ant
description: A large matrix where we can simulate Langton's Ant that has the simple rules: if white turn left, if black turn right

name: Conways Game of Life
description: With a twist, you can reverse the direction of time

name: PID Control
description: PID stands for proportional integral derivative which is a controller that will try to reach a state this interaction lets you change the constants and goal state

name: Hearts <3
description: Randomized heart animations for my love

name: Sheps :)
description: What it is like to kiss with my current girlfriend <3

name: Triangles.
description: Random triangles popping up on your screen!

name: PID Race car
description: Small simulation with a car that uses PID to follow a wall. Click and drag to add obstacles

name: Base Calculator
description: Add number, its base A, and target base B this will convert the number from base A to base B

name: Dopler Effect Simulation
description: Dopler effect is the effect of having waves in motion this shows different vizualizations you can use

name: Stopwatch
description: Colorful stopwatch

name: Selection Sort
description: Sorting algorithm that picks the next best item to sort O(n²), Ω(n²)

name: Insertion Sort
description: Sorting algorithm that swaps items until they are in the right place O(n²), Ω(n)

name: Merge Sort
description: Sorting algorithm that uses divide and conquer to sort smaller problems and combine them to sort an array O(n²)

name: Lissajous Generator
description: Lissajous created by using circles with different periods

name: Flappy Bird
description: Remake of Flappy Bird, press space to jump

name: Asteroids
description: Remake of Asteroids, use arrow keys to more space to shoot

name: Drunk Walk
description: Shows brownian motion and the path the agent takes

name: Particle Interaction
description: Shows brownian motion with particles and allows you to see interactions

name: Wave Particles
description: Shows particles that move in circles, your mous position changes their period and their overall image

name: Angle PID
description: Test your agility! Dodge as three turrets use advanced PID control to target and hit your cursor. Can you outmaneuver them and survive?

name: Calculator

name: Bar Visualization
